channel.title: Soulcraft new minecraft server. [1.5]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i23.servimg.com/u/f23/16/03/12/84/logo_j10.png[/img]
~~~~~~~~~Server Details~~~~~~~~ Version: 1.5 Server IP: mycraft.no-ip.biz
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~Server Rules~~~~~~~~ No Griefing No Hacking or Cheating No Stealing Please dont ask for staff Respect everyone - don't be rude!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~Staff List~~~~~~~~~~ Admins:[i] Tim - loled2 Whattehp406 - bjorn Lon86 - James[/i] -------------------------------- Mods: [i]None[/i] [i]None[/i] [i]None[/i] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~Craft Book~~~~~~~~~~~ We have on this server craft book it have allot of cool stuff
Some of the new things
- Bridges - Cauldrons Light switches - Readable bookshelves - Elevators - Gates
and a lot of more cool stuff at
http://craftbook.sk89q.com/wiki/Main_Page
look at the left side for "CraftBook" then do "How to use" ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~Dynmap~~~~~~~~ we have a new dynmap
it shows the names of the players who are online and you can talk in it for the online players shows Web: (ip)
it shows to the time of the day and day, night you can see to were north east west south is
link: http://mycraft.no-ip.biz:8123/ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~Fixes~~~~~~~~~~~ No more "No permissions" to use that command Mod commands are fixed and plugins are now more stable ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center] [pre][size=24pt]LWC[/size] Lwc is a program that protects your chestes and more!
It protects Chests Signs Dispensers Doors Furnaces
Commands /lwc -c {public, private} {Owners of the chest} this is a protection that your chest or some thing else is unbreakeble and cant lookin
/lwc -c password {password} it creates a password on your chest so all people who knows the password can do /cpassword {password}
/lwc -remove {type like chest} [center][/center]

item.title: Soulcraft new minecraft server. [1.5]
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:47, topic:388610”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=484430.msg3569555#msg3569555 date=1302925512]

If you want a networking and performance advantage I suggest using the Lightstone server. Notch’s is thread-per-client, has a memory abusing GUI and some other performance bottlenecks.

The official server doesn’t have a GUI? Or at least you can run it without a GUI, I do.

Anyway, is Lightstone in a usable state yet?
[/quote]Yeah, it glows.

Lightstone = Minecraft server by Graham.

Glowstone = glowing stone block in minecraft.[/quote]Lolfail xD

Read full topic

item.title: Soulcraft new minecraft server. [1.5]
item.dc:creator: @loled2 loled2
item.description:
@loled2 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:43, topic:388610”]I dislike the ‘modern’ spawn city.
Wouldn’t it be better to make it a Medieval town? With a blacksmith, baker, farm, church of the holy apple and a library.
If you and Lon agree i could make it with T4nk.

Probably search for a good flat area and setspawn there when town is finished.

Tell me what you think of it.[/quote]

i like the idea
but, we already were working on new spawn its now a big castle and some other stuff arround

Read full topic
